dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per 17 USC 512 (c)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Justin S. [mailto:webmaster@proxify.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 29, 2007 2:25 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per 17
USC 512 (c) 

Attention: Legal Department

Dear Sir or Madam,

I am writing to file a notice of copyright infringement in accordance  
with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on "http:// 
proxify.com/tos.shtml" and "http://proxify.com/pp.shtml". Proxify.com  
is a wholly owned subsidiary of UpsideOut, Inc. and has been in  
operation since 2003-04-14.

2. The material that we believe is infringing the copyrighted work  
listed in item #1 appears on "http://www.findproxy.org/terms.php" and  
"http://www.findproxy.org/privacy.php" which are located at IP  
address "67.15.80.3". This material is copied entirely except that  
all the appearances of our trademark and tradename "Proxify" have  
been changed to their name.


3. My contact information:
Name: Justin Schlecter
Company: UpsideOut, Inc. D.B.A. Proxify
Address: 1333A N. Ave., STE 315, New Rochelle, NY 10804
Phone: 1-877-PROXIFY
Email: webmaster@proxify.com


4. Contact information for the owner of the allegedly infringing  
material:
Registrant Name:Yoland Dresden
Registrant Street1:2600 E. Bayshore Pkwy Mountain
Registrant Street2:
Registrant Street3:
Registrant City:CA
Registrant State/Province:California
Registrant Postal Code:94043
Registrant Country:US
Registrant Phone:+1.16503300200
Registrant Phone Ext.:
Registrant FAX:
Registrant FAX Ext.:
Registrant Email:support@wmxp.com


5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials  
described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the  
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the  
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am  
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that  
is allegedly infringed.

Signed,
Justin Schlecter, President
UpsideOut, Inc. D.B.A. Proxify
1-877-PROXIFY
